
{{alias}}( value )
    Returns a string value indicating a specification defined classification of
    an object.

    Parameters
    ----------
    value: any
        Input value.

    Returns
    -------
    out: string
        String value indicating a specification defined classification of the
        input value.

    Examples
    --------
    > var str = {{alias}}( 'a' )
    '[object String]'
    > str = {{alias}}( 5 )
    '[object Number]'
    > function Beep(){};
    > str = {{alias}}( new Beep() )
    '[object Object]'

    See Also
    --------
